    java.lang.String toString()  
    void work()
    This function performs a work unit in each beat according to the following requirements: Sends all available trucks to local branches in the order of the branch numbers. The truck will load all the packages waiting for it to be transferred to the branch to which it is traveling. If the non-standard truck is available, and there is a non-standard package in the sorting center that is waiting to be collected and its dimensions fit the truck, the truck will be sent to collect the package.

    • work

      public void work()
      This function performs a work unit in each beat according to the following requirements:
      • Sends all available trucks to local branches in the order of the branch numbers.
      • The truck will load all the packages waiting for it to be transferred to the branch to which it is traveling.
      • If the non-standard truck is available, and there is a non-standard package in the sorting center that is waiting to
      be collected and its dimensions fit the truck, the truck will be sent to collect the package.
      Specified by:
      work in interface Node
      Overrides:
      work in class Branch
